subtitle: A complete meal: tender fish and prawns in a creamy warm sauce with new potatoes.

method.text: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the onion, garlic and leek. Gently fry for 5 min until soft. Stir in the turmeric.
Add the potatoes, wine and cream. Season to taste. Bring to the boil. Cover. Cook for 10 min.
Meanwhile, skin the fish and remove any bones. Cut into 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm (1in) cubes. Add to the pan. Reduce heat and gently simmer for 5-6 min or until fish and potatoes are cooked.
Stir in the prawns and dill. Serve.

title: Saucy seafood
